mapper.select: select op.optionId, op.optionName from room_option rop inner join options op on rop.optionId = op.optionId where roomId = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: insert into room(roomType, addr, detailAddr, dealType, yearRent, deposit, monthRent, areaP, areaM, floor, moveDay, mCost, parking, elevator, lof, title, content, createDate, hostId, lat, lng) values(#{roomType}, #{addr}, #{detailAddr}, #{dealType}, #{yearRent}, #{deposit}, #{monthRent}, #{areaP}, #{areaM}, #{floor}, #{moveDay}, #{mCost}, #{parking}, #{elevator}, #{lof}, #{areaM}title, #{content}, now(), #{hostId}, #{lat}, #{lng})
